item.title: about
item.description: Hello, I’m Rui (Lucas) Zhu u+9510 u+6731, and you are? I have slick minimalist templates for list pages (such as a list of blog posts) and single pages (a page to read one blog post). You can use tags on your content, and view content by tags. I also have a simple responsive gallery feature. It’ll look great on any screen, and all you have to do is provide a folder of images.

item.title: lucas
item.description: Why do I name myself Lucas?
